column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////After seeing other yelpers speak highly of the meatloaf bites and the pulled pork hush puppies
column2: we decided to get those. The meatloaf bites had zero flavor; neither my friend nor I are people who like to leave food behind
column3: but neither of us ate our second bite. The accompanying tomato sauce was too sweet and very thin
column4: which made it hard to eat on the bite on a shared dish. The hush puppies suffered from the same lack of flavor. The exterior was crisp
column5: but both the meat and breading were bland. Luckily the mustard sauce added some much-needed moisture and flavor; it was the only thing that saved this dish for either of us
column6: but I wouldn't order it again.
